name: David Ramirez
text: No, I still think you should. I just think that it's illusory and still overvalued. In the long term (the 30+ years until your retirement), it's wise regardless of whether I'm paranoid or not for you to put money into the market. By then, bubbles will pop and there will be real growth for sure. If I am just being paranoid, it's even better.
